harshTruths.title: Your Daughter's Future
harshTruths.truth: If you don't make it to IIT, your daughter's opportunities shrink by 90%. She'll face the same financial struggles you did.

harshTruths.title: Your Empire Dreams
harshTruths.truth: Without IIT's network and opportunities, your empire becomes a small business. Your Porsche becomes a second-hand sedan.

harshTruths.title: The Porsche Reality
harshTruths.truth: At ₹3.5 LPA, your Porsche 911 Turbo S will remain a wallpaper on your phone. Forever.

harshTruths.title: Your Current Study Hours
harshTruths.truth: 322 hours total. IIT toppers have 3000+ hours. You're not even in the same league.

harshTruths.title: The Competition
harshTruths.truth: While you're reading this, 10,000 students are solving problems. They want your IIT seat.
